Why Choose Authorized Elevator?

Specializing in Life in Motion!

Authorized Elevator is a full-service vertical transportation company serving Missouri and Illinois. Our company is centrally unified around our core values of integrity, loyalty, trust, and responsibility. Our team of expert technicians are licensed, trained, uniquely qualified to perform elevator maintenance, repairs, or a complete revitalization and modernize your elevator, escalator, or ADA accessibility device. We perform maintenance, installation, modernization, repair, and inspections on all forms of vertical transportation device including, but not limited to manufacturers such as Otis Elevator, Thyssenkrupp, Dover Elevator, Schindler Elevator, Kone Elevator, Delaware Elevator, and many more.

What We Do?

We Have the Expertise to Get Any
Job Done Large or Small!

Do you feel overwhelmed with your elevator, escalator, or wheelchair lift? We offer a comprehensive client experience that includes seamless communication, dedicated project management, and help with design and value engineering.

Construction & Modernization

Authorized Elevator brings world-wide elevator installation and modernization experience right to your building.

Construction & Modernization
Our team conveniently located in St. Louis, Missouri has completed elevator projects across the America and across the world. Our elevator installation & modernization teams have successfully completed hundreds of projects. Let us complete your project next.
Maintenance & Repair

Vertical transportation is a significant asset in your property.

Maintenance & Repair
It is the responsibility of the property stakeholder to provide ADA Accessibility for any person who may enter the property.

Safe and reliable elevators are a major part of these requirements. Authorized Elevator understands the importance of safe and reliable elevators. Our elevator maintenance program will help to provide a welcoming environment for all individuals. We know there is no good time for elevator down time! Our team of dispatchers will prioritize your elevator brake down service call and route an technician to your location ASAP so we can get your elevator operating ASAP.

An investment into a maintenance program with Authorized Elevator will prolong the lifecycle of your device(s) and reduce costly repairs. Proper maintenance can significantly reduce or eliminate repair cost and downtime. When the unfortunate repair is required, Authorized's service fleet, with fully stocked vehicles will repair your device(s) quickly and cost effectively. We are factory trained to work on most makes and models including but not limiting to Otis, TKE, Schindler, Kone, Delaware, Dover, MEI, GALaxy, MCE, and many more.
Smart & Safe Devices

Elevator safety and elevator compliance are critical to the undisrupted use of your facility.

Smart & Safe Devices
Authorized Elevator understands this and prioritizes this. We have focused teams which are ready to complete your elevator inspection and elevator test. We can react quickly and complete these tests within 72 hours in most cases. If your elevator or escalator has a violation from a previous inspection, we will perform the corrective repairs to resolve the elevator violation and perform and reinspection of your devis(s) to ensure you receive an elevator certificate right away. Several of our technicians hold elevator inspector certifications themselves which helps to ensure our work is completed the correct way the first time. If you have any questions about elevator inspections or elevator violations, please email sales@authorizedelevator.com directly. We are a licensed inspectors and can help resolve any concerns you may have ASAP.
